message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I am willing to pay $85 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $87 for the product.
